command.name: generate
command.description: Assemble UI prototypes by combining layout templates with design tokens (default animation support), pure assembler without new content generation

intent.primary_user_value: Generate HTML/CSS UI prototypes by assembling layout templates with design tokens for /workflow:ui-design:generate (no new content generation).

must_not: Do not invent layout or token content; only assemble existing inputs
Do not claim pointers are Existing unless verifiable in-repo
Do not write outside the resolved design-run base_path except for required tool/template reads

p0: Base path resolved by priority: --design-id > --session > auto-detect latest
Reads all layout-*.json templates and all style-*/design-tokens.json variants
Writes prototypes and preview files; generated prototype count equals styles * layouts * targets
